blogposts.title: Santorini, the trip of my life.
blogposts.content:
Yes, this is the best trip i've ever had. I went there July 2018 and stayed in Fira.
Our hotel room had a view overlooking the ocean, with white sunbeds. Our days started and ended with me and my husband laying down on the sunbeds to just relax and listen to the sound of the ocean. 
The town was crowded but peaceful at the same time. The food was soo delicious, escpecially the greek sallad.
I really recomend this place.
blogposts.name: Paul

blogposts.title: Paris the most romantic city to visit.
blogposts.content:
Last month i went to Paris with my husband.
We stayed near the Eiffel Tower and it was AMAAZIIING! So beautiful at night time with all the lights.
The food in Paris gets 5 stars from us, the people and the sourroundings makes you feel like youre in a movie.
blogposts.name: Sarah

blogposts.title: Sweden, Stockholm
blogposts.content:
What a country!
Snowy, windy, cold, wet, busy & gray.
Jupp thats my experience in a nutshell!
Hope you all that visited have better memories from there.
blogposts.name: Karen

blogposts.title: Trip to Amalfi coast
blogposts.content: My trip to Amalfi coast was so amazing. We took a boat trip to get the best view on the coastline and watched a beautiful sunset.
blogposts.name: Theodor

pageComments.comment: Depends on the time of year really, had a blast last summer! Nice people and the swedish meatballs are to die for!

pageComments.comment: The swedish winter are amazing, so magical with all the snow glittering on the ground, houses, trees, yeah you name it.

pageComments.comment: I'm from stockholm and i agree, people are like ice.
